description: {"blocks":[{"key":"eqnvp","text":"The protocol describes the preparation of TAP media plates containing 0.5% to 0.75% Impranil, with the inclusion of antifungal and ampicillin. Notably, agarose was employed instead of agar to achieve a lighter gel color. These specialized plates serve the purpose of identifying Chlamydomonas reinhardtii strains secreting the plastic-degrading enzyme PHL7, discerned by the halo formation around the colonies.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a6209","text":"Top off TAP media with Milli-Q water until you get to  , let it stir for a couple of minutes then remove it from the stir plate. Place a square foil paper on top of the flask to cover and label the flask. It is now ready to be autoclaved.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":54,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9rho1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":3}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"besqb","text":"Securely place the flask inside a suitable autoclavable container. Add water to the container, ensuring sufficient coverage around the flask. Load the autoclave with the container and set the autoclave parameters according to the manufacturer's guidelines. Use a cycle time of 01:00:00 (1 hour) with settings appropriate for your specific autoclave model (e.g., gravity 30). Start the autoclave cycle, following standard operating procedures for your laboratory's equipment.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cbgne","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7uk3v","text":"Note: Refer to the autoclave manufacturer's instructions for precise settings and safety guidelines. Adjust time and settings as needed for your specific autoclave.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"66gls","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"suc8","text":"Once the autoclave has completed, take out the flask, place on stir plate to give a quick stir then place in a water bath at a temperature of   for   -   before adding antibiotics.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":142,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":148,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":152,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"65ot0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"55","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":7200,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":14400,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

steps.section: Water bath cool down and sterile technique to pour plates
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"ebs3q","text":"Place flask on stir plate and measure the temperature of the TAP media with an infrared thermometer. After the temperature is below  , using sterile technique, add the antibiotics and the rest of the ingredients. If temperature is still high, let it sit on the stir plate and cool down for a few more minutes. For   of TAP media add   of   antifungal,   of ampicillin   in   ethanol and either   or   of impranil (Anionic aliphatic polyester-polyurethane dispersion. Impranil DLN SD) for   or   of impranil per 1 liter of media. Let it stir.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":132,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":314,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":333,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":338,"length":1},{"key":4,"offset":352,"length":1},{"key":5,"offset":368,"length":1},{"key":6,"offset":373,"length":1},{"key":7,"offset":394,"length":1},{"key":8,"offset":399,"length":1},{"key":9,"offset":488,"length":1},{"key":10,"offset":493,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4ssao","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"50","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":3}},"10":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"0.75","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":206}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"11","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"3":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"1.0302","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":204}},"4":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"5":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"150","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":204}},"6":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"70","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":206}},"7":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"5.0","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"labe title: TAP 0.5%-0.75% impranil agarose plates
warning:
{"blocks":[{"key":"2e16g","text":"Wear appropriate PPE, including gloves, safety glasses or goggles, and protective clothing, as recommended by the SDS.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1oc3d","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5t9hh","text":"Work in a well-ventilated area or use local exhaust ventilation to minimize inhalation exposure.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c17k1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8fao","text":"Avoid direct skin contact.
